price: 22. They are those whose works will be lost in this world and in the Hereafter, and they will have no helpers.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ حَبِطَتۡ أَعۡمَٰلُهُمۡ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَمَا لَهُم مِّن نَّٰصِرِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna ḥabiṭat aʿmāluhum fī al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati wamā lahum min nāṣirīna
